description:
*** One of the best educational apps of the year - Apple (iTunes Rewind) ***
Learn Portuguese while playing games -- with MindSnacks, it’s that easy. Featuring 9 addictive games designed for essential vocab & conversation skills, our Portuguese app is perfect for adults, kids, students and travelers hoping to boost their Portuguese prowess.

By using games instead of pesky flashcards, you’ll do more than just memorize the apps 1000+ words. You’ll learn things like conjugation, the difference between regular and irregular verbs and much more. Whether you’re brushing up on old skills or discovering new ones, we’ll will help make Portuguese feel less like a second language and more like second nature. 

Download the first lesson completely free, then upgrade to get all 50 Lessons and up to 40+ hours of content. As a timely bonus, the app also includes a specific lesson packed with Soccer terms for fans headed to Brazil for the 2014 World Cup. That sounds to us like a Goooooooooooaaaaaaaaaaaal!!!

* PRESS *

USA Today
One of the top-three iOS apps that “make the process of learning new words fun.”

148 Apps
"It's fun to do and it's amazing how quickly users will notice results."

App Safari
"This app is not just your average, run-of-the-mill crash course... It includes complex exercises, challenges, and lessons that make the learning process fun and effective."

* FEATURES * 

-- 9 addictive and unique games
-- 1000+ Portuguese words & phrases to study and master
-- Spoken audio clips provided by a native Portuguese speaker to help with pronunciation
-- Hand-illustrated image library to help memorize words
-- 50 Portuguese lessons designed by Ivy League instructors (upgrade required)
-- Personalized learning algorithms to maximize memorization, retention & contextual usage
-- Enhanced review mode lets you replay previously mastered lessons
-- Additional quests & challenges will keep you motivated
-- More frequent high-fives due to a genuine sense of achievement and your massive acquisition of knowledge 

* WHAT OUR (SUPER AWESOME) FANS HAVE TO SAY *

“I’ve been trying so many different ways to learn Portuguese and this is the only one where I actually remember what I learn! Plus I can play wherever! Love this app!”

“I’m addicted to learning Portuguese now. My Brazilian girlfriend is so proud!”

“Portuguese has never been simpler :)”

“Excellent games to keep me motivated to keep learning. Definitely recommended!”

* THE SCIENCE BEHIND MINDSNACKS *

At MindSnacks we like to keep it fun, but we’re serious about learning. That’s why our Portuguese app includes 9 challenging games designed by Ivy League professors. Each game teaches a specific aspect of Portuguese, creating a well-rounded learning experience for both kids and adults that goes far beyond basic vocabulary flashcards. 

Of course studying is only worth it if it works, so our unique algorithm reinforces the learning process using proven methods from the field of memory studies. Over time, the games adapt to your individual performance, selectively repeating Portuguese words, phrases and grammatical points with which you’ve previously struggled. In other words, as you learn Portuguese, the app learns about you for a more effective learning experience. 

Perfect for beginning and intermediate learners, MindSnacks lets you learn Portuguese at home, on the bus or during lunch breaks. You’ll soon spend less time looking at that translation dictionary and more time letting those Portuguese words roll right off your tongue.
